definition: a large motorboat that has a cabin and plumbing and other conveniences necessary for living on board
details:
noun
- a large motorboat that has a cabin and plumbing and other conveniences necessary for living on board
= synonyms: cabin cruiser
- a large fast warship
- a car in which policemen cruise the streets
= synonyms: police cruiser, patrol car, police car, prowl car, squad car
